name: Wing 2 Training
description:
> *The search for a missing Pact leader continues as you and your allies venture deeper into the Forsaken Thicket. Strange magical energy has run amok, and long-hidden mysteries wait to be brought to light.*

This is the second raid wing of the Forsaken Thicket. We will have to face three encounters:
<:slothasor:703930783206998087> **Slothasor** - A fairly hard boss that requires pulls and good CC and favours power DPS.
<:trio:703930901796618260> **Trio** - An easy encounter that has no particular requirements.
<:matthias:703930783311593563> **Matthias** - A medium difficulty fight that favours condi DPS.

Both power and condi DPS work for these encounters.

<:quick_generic:1176639827890937986> <:alac_generic:1176639824292220958> **Boon Roles:**
- Two quickness/alacrity providers must handle **Sloth Fear**, which involves bringing <:stability:844163847161774121> **Stability** (or instant group condi cleanses / stunbreaks) to negate the <:fear:715162058802593872> **Fear** done by <:slothasor:703930783206998087> **Slothasor**.

<:contacts:1163765170829525024> **Roles Anyone Can Choose:**
- Two people will need to take the **Reflect** and **Backup Reflect** roles for <:matthias:703930783311593563> **Matthias**. Good reflect sources are <:firebrand:763700488825733142> **Firebrand**'s `Chapter 3: Valiant Bulwark` (tome F3), <:guardian:675414198850813964> **Guardian**'s `Wall of Reflection`, and <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer's** `Feedback`.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This is a standard template for a Wing 2 practice run which has two **Stability** roles assigned to <:quick_generic:1176639827890937986> **Quickness** players for <:slothasor:703930783206998087> **Slothasor**'s <:fear:715162058802593872> **Fear**. It also explicitly assigns a **Reflect** and **Backup Reflect** to two participants of the raid for <:matthias:703930783311593563> **Matthias**.
